Pre-Game Insights: Denver heads into a matchup against Miami as winners of three straight games.
Denver finished 57-25 overall last season while going 33-8 at home.
The Nuggets averaged 114.9 points per game last season, 15.1 on free throws and 35.1 from beyond the arc.
Miami went 46-36 overall a season ago while going 24-17 on the road.
The Heat gave up 108.4 points per game while committing 17.3 fouls last season.
Others: Injuries for the Nuggets include Vlatko Cancar (day to day, ankle), Jamal Murray (out, concussion), Aaron Gordon (out, calf), and DaRon Holmes II (out for season, achilles).
Injuries for the Heat include Kevin Love (out, reconditioning) and Jaime Jaquez Jr. (out, illness).
